briefTitle: Assessing Safety, Hospitalization and Efficacy of rNAPc2 in COVID-19
officialTitle: Assessing Safety, Hospitalization and Efficacy of rNAPc2 in COVID-19 (ASPEN-COVID-19)
summary: Sequential randomized, multicenter, active comparator study to evaluate the hypothesis that rNAPc2 (AB201), a novel, potent and highly selective tissue factor inhibitor with anticoagulant, anti-inflammatory and potential antiviral properties, shortens time to recovery compared to heparin in hospitalized patients with COVID-19 and elevated D-dimer levels.

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportional Change in D-dimer Level From Baseline to Day 8, or Day of Discharge if Prior to Day 8 (Phase 2b)
